subtitle.translate: Wirelessly access the network within a 64 block radius

description: This is the advanced version of the terminal
If you have a tier 1 beacon(9 blocks below it) within 8 blocks of the network connector it will be able to be accessed from within the same dimension
If you have a tier 4 beacon(Max level beacon) within 8 blocks of the network connector it will be able to be access from any dimension
